metadata.title: CVE-2024-21520 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Versions of the package djangorestframework before 3.15.2 are vulnerable toCross-site Scripting (XSS) via the break_long_headers template filter dueto improper input sanitization before splitting and joining with
